com.drgarbage.algorithms

Class FindBackEdgesDFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.drgarbage.algorithms.DFSBase
      • com.drgarbage.algorithms.DFSForward
        • com.drgarbage.algorithms.FindBackEdgesDFS

  • public class FindBackEdgesDFS
extends DFSForward
    Finds a set of back edges for the given graph. The set is empty if the graph doesn't contain any cycles.

    The DFS colors a vertex WHITE if it visits the vertex first time. The vertex is colored BLACK when its edge list has been examined completely. The recursion has been finished at this vertex. So any edges to a BLACK vertex cannot be back edges. If the DFS revisit the vertex while it is still WHITE, a back edge has been detected.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Id$
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev
